name: Video Game Control using Pose Classification
shortDescription: This project showcases a captivating implementation of video game control (Ashes Cricket 2009) through pose classification using TF Lite, allowing the users to play the game without using a keyboard.
longDescription: This project showcases a captivating implementation of video game control (Ashes Cricket 2009) through pose classification using TF Lite, allowing the users to play the game without using a keyboard.
